snippet: Teva Pharmaceutical Industries of Israel named Jeremy Levin of Bristol-Myers Squibb as its next chief executive.
abstract: Teva Pharmaceutical Industries of Israel names Jeremy Levin of Bristol-Myers Squibb as chief executive and president, effective in May.
lead_paragraph: Teva Pharmaceutical Industries of Israel named Jeremy Levin of Bristol-Myers Squibb as its next chief executive.

headline.main: Teva Names a New Chief Executive
headline.print_headline: Teva Names a New Chief Executive
